ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We acknowledge the financial support by Portuguese National Funds, through FCT – Fundação para a Ciência e Tecnologia, within the project UID/BIA/00329/2013, UID/CVT/00276/2013CIISA – CIISA, Centre for Interdisciplinary Research in Animal Health, Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, University of Lisbon and PEst-OE/AGR/UI0276/2014, which enabled this work. N. Santos was supported by the post-doctoral fellowship (SFRH/BPD/

116596/2016) from Fundação para a Ciência e Tecnologia. For the biological samples we acknowledge BTVS (Banco de Tecidos de Vida Selvagem) and SMLM (Sistema de Monitorização de Lobos Mortos) of ICNF (Instituto de Conservação da Natureza e das Florestas, Portugal). We would also like to acknowledge all the colleagues and collaborators who collected the samples in the field.
